resources.string: Radio Agakiza n\'isamirizi y\'ishengero ry\'abadventiste b \'umusi ugira indwi mu Burundi.Iyo samirizi ifise igikorwa co kuvuga ubutumwa bw\'abamarayika batatu biciye mu biganiro n\'indirimbo ishikiriza.
Guhamagara abantu bose guhinduka abigishwa ba Yesu kristo, kuvuga ubutumwa butazoshira bwa abamarayika batatu(Ivyah 14:6-13) no gutegura isi ukugaruka ukundi kwa Yesu Kristo.
Gusubiza itoto ivy\'Imana yaremye vyose bigatungana nk\'uko nayo igororotse.Ico kintu niwo mugambi nyamukuru w\'Imana uhwaniranye n\'ubuhanuzi nyamukuru bwo munyandiko zera

string.name: internet
string.i: Nturi kumuhora wa interinete.Gerageza kuja kumuhora wa interinete hama uheze wumvirize isamirizi yacu ariyo rwanyu.Uhejeje fyonda kuri gerageza kandi.Murakoze
